description:
The US Federal Trade Commission (FTC) is swinging its big, regulatory stick at fake online reviews. Rules announced earlier this year are now in effect, banning reviews by fake people, AI-generated text, and those who don’t disclose their status as company insiders or affiliates.

If you spot violations of the new policy, you can report them directly to the FTC, for a maximum fine of $51,744.

The FTC’s updated guidelines for online reviews outlaw six specific types of fakery: reviews from people who aren’t real or use AI-generated text or images, no paid reviews (or other forms of compensation, like those sneaky $10 coupons thrown in with an Amazon shipment), no reviews from employees of the company offering the product or others wit
title: You can now report fake reviews to the FTC

description:
The best budget 4K gaming monitor we’ve ever tested is now available at its cheapest price ever as the Asus TUF VG289Q drops to $199 on Amazon, a 17 percent discount off its $239 MSRP.

This 28-inch IPS display delivers stunningly crisp and detailed visuals at a 3840×2160 resolution. The monitor is compatible with HDR10 (high dynamic range) for beautiful colors and brightness levels, meaning you’ll have a great experience no matter what you’re watching.

When we reviewed the Asus TUF VG289Q gaming monitor, we gave it a four-star rating and praised its video quality and overall gaming performance, as well as the fact that it comes with several ergonomic adjustme
title: Our favorite budget 4K gaming monitor just hit its best-ever price

description:
Converting a PDF to an image or JPG can be useful for various reasons. Perhaps you need a specific image from a PDF document or want to save a PDF as an image to insert it into a presentation. In this article, you will learn how to convert a PDF to JPG using simple methods and which tools are best suited for this.

Further reading: The best PDF editors

What is the difference between PDF and JPG?

PDF (Portable Document Format) is a format that was developed for the exchange of document
title: How to convert a PDF to JPG

description:
In-flight Wi-Fi comes with the same risks you’d find when connecting to any public Wi-Fi network. Unfortunately, in our haste to keep connected on a long flight, we often don’t give it a second thought. But precautions should be taken to safeguard against common threats.

The best solution if you want to browse online while mid-air is a VPN. A VPN will securely encrypt your traffic, keeping it safe and private. Here I’ll show you the potential risks involved with in-flight Wi-Fi and how a VPN is the perfect tool to protect yourself.

Check out my list of best VPNs to keep you safe whether you’re up in the sky or down on land.

title: Here’s why you need a VPN with in-flight Wi-Fi

description:
Arm Ltd. has notified its licensee Qualcomm, informing the company that its architectural license will be terminated in 60 days — the agreement that allows Qualcomm to manufacture the Oryon CPU cores at the heart of the Snapdragon X Elite chip.

PCWorld has independently confirmed an earlier Bloomberg report that Arm is canceling the architectural license agreement, the agreement that allows Qualcomm to manufacture custom cores, like the company’s Oryon processor. Qualcomm called the cancellation notice “more unfounded threats” and that it looks forward to a trial in December that is set to resolve the issue.

In the fall of 2022,
title: Arm will cancel Qualcomm’s license to make the Snapdragon X Elite
